subdisciplines.name: Body Art
subdisciplines.description: Performance art that involves the artist's body as the medium of expression.

subdisciplines.name: Gesture and Movement
subdisciplines.description: Performance art that emphasizes the physical movement of the artist's body.

subdisciplines.name: Performance Poetry
subdisciplines.description: Performance art that combines poetry with theatrical and dramatic performance.

subdisciplines.name: Performance Art Installation
subdisciplines.description: Performance art that involves the creation of a temporary or permanent artistic installation.

subdisciplines.name: Live Art
subdisciplines.description: Performance art that pushes the boundaries of traditional theatre and includes multimedia and cross-disciplinary experimentation.
